variants.Description in input context: The SNCA p.Arg697Gln variant was found to be associated with familial Parkinson's disease.
The LRRK2 p.Lys384Asn variant was observed in patients exhibiting atypical Parkinsonian features.

Material used.Description: Fibroblasts were obtained from patients diagnosed with familial Parkinson’s disease. Control fibroblasts were also obtained.

Readout description.Result Description: The SNCA p.Arg697Gln variant showed increased α-synuclein mRNA levels compared to control fibroblasts.
The LRRK2 p.Lys384Asn variant showed reduced LRRK2 protein levels.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated with fibroblasts from three independent patients with the SNCA mutation and two patients with the LRRK2 mutation.

Technical replicates.Description: Each qPCR reaction was performed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type control fibroblasts were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No template control was included to verify the specificity of the PCR primers.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to compare mRNA levels between patients and controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: mRNA levels within the range observed in age-matched controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: mRNA levels significantly higher than those observed in age-matched controls (p < 0.05).
